text: 2.2: Zo 12.31; Ef 5.6; 6.12; Kor 1.21; 3.6-7; Ta 3.3Nde mba tugivigen, nde kha nuianan tɨvi mbatɨgi, nde nta zɨn vuav, wari rui. Nde kha buivar ki ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi gari guman pan, nde ana tɨvi zɨn vegi. Mba ŋina mbatɨk, ana ŋkasŋka ntigem Fhe Bakɨme buni daasui gumgi gu mbigi ndavi vheri gari.
